name: Clean PinkBike 2016
description: This style changes the look of pinkbike.com dramatically to be more readable and have lesser distractions
additional_info:
Apr 17 2017 | This style is no longer being actively maintained. current version: 2.0.2
  • Be sure to report any issues in the "Discussions" section as I'll fix them as soon as possible.
  • Suggestions are always welcome.
  • Feel free to leave feedback, as it is much appreciated.
changelog: v1.0.0 | May 17 2016
  • First release of this style
